revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Letters on Greece; being a sequel to letters on Egypt, and containing travels through Rhodes, Crete, and other islands of the Archipelago; with comparative remarks..."
revision.text: Possibly: Letters on Greece; being a sequel to letters on Egypt, and containing travels through Rhodes, Crete, and other islands of the Archipelago; with comparative remarks on their ancient and present state, and observations on the government, character, and manners, of the Turks, and modern Greeks. Translated from the French of M. Savary. (Claude Etienne Savary). (London : Printed for G. G. J. and J. Ronbinson, Paternoster-Row, M DCC LXXXVIII. [1788]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2437011~S1
